Articles.Content:
yep.. I'm gonna be "that guy" that starts a thread about the next update an hour after the release of .21!

/discuss .22!

Dam and blast! Beat me by seconds! Oh well, IBTL I suppose. I'm not even going near .21 for a while. It's like 10,000 guinea pigs all trying to get to the same banana. Lots of pushing and squeaking but not much consuming going on.

Seriously... Wow, come on it's been like an hour!

Calm down a bit.

That said... Resources!
Sorry, but this is far, far too soon, we're already flooded as is. Sorry about the inconvenience for those that already wish to discuss 0.22
